data.message: Best rapper ever period. There will never ever be another Marshall Mathers. A true gem, one in a billion. You've gotten me through the toughest times in my life and there was a lot of fuckin tough times. My inspiration in so many ways,  But number 1 is staying clean. You're honestly a gift from God. Yeah I said it. We'll walk together, through the storm, no matter weather, cold or warm, just letting you know they you're not alone, holla of you feel like you've been down the same road  <3 ....this is the only thing I, thing I knowwww
